amendment.description: Amendment requires any product liability action for injury sustained in the United States and that relates to the purchase or use of a product manufactured outside the United States by a foreign manufacturer to be heard by a Federal court and that such court shall have jurisdiction over the manufacturer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that the relevant federal court shall have jurisdiction over foreign manufacturers in any product liability action for injuries sustained in the U.S. as a result of using that product.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 258 - 166 (Roll no. 221).
